sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Find the mean proportion of 17.5 and 0.7 
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": " The mean proportion of \input[s1v1]{} and 0.7 is \[$\sqrt{17.5 \times 0.7 }\]$."}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[
	= \sqrt{\frac{\input[s2v1]{} \times 7.0 }{100}}\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "\[=\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{10} = 3.5\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "Since, 
\[
	\input[s4v1]{} \times 7.0 = 1225 = 35 ^2
\]
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [17.5], "text": "Using the formula for mean proportion which is $\sqrt{a	imes b}, where $a$ and $b$ are numbers."}, {"data": [175.0], "text": "We can simplify the product of the two numbers by dividing both the numbers by 100, which can be written as $\sqrt{\frac{175.0 \times 7.0 }{100}$."}, {"data": [35], "text": "Taking square root and simplifing we get\[=\frac{35 }{10} = 3.5\]"}, {"data": [175.0], "text": "Further simplification we get us to the required result 35 ^2."}]
